name: Sid Meier's Colonization
notes:
Requires the latest version of GOG's Linux installer.
Uses game data from GOG with DOSBox from Lutris.

files.game: N/A:Select the Linux installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Linux installer downloaded from GOG
- unzip_tar: http://lutris.net/files/tools/unzip.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/Game/dosboxCOL.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: unzip_tar
- execute:
    args: $game -d "$GAMEDIR" "data/noarch/*"
    description: Extracting game data...
    file: $CACHE/unzip
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Game
    src: $GAMEDIR/data/noarch
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/Game/dosboxCOL.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
main_file: Game/dosboxCOL_single.conf
